channel.title: Blog on Azure Nigeria Community
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Azure Nigeria Community

item.title: Top 5 Azure Certifications for Nigerian Developers
item.description:
Azure certifications help validate your skills and open doors to new opportunities.

1. AZ-900: Azure Fundamentals

Perfect for beginners starting their cloud journey.

2. AZ-104: Azure Administrator

Ideal for professionals managing Azure infrastructure.

3. AZ-204: Azure Developer

Great for developers building cloud-native apps.

4. DP-900: Azure Data Fundamentals

Best for data enthusiasts exploring Azure data services.

5. AI-900: Azure AI Fundamentals

A strong entry point for AI and machine learning on Azure.

item.title: Recap: Our First Virtual Azure Workshop
item.description:

item.title: Welcome to Azure Nigeria Community
item.description:
Azure Nigeria Community is a thriving community of developers, cloud enthusiasts, and tech professionals passionate about Microsoft Azure and cloud technologies. Our mission is to build, nurture, and showcase Nigerian talent in the global cloud computing space.

What We Do

  • Instructor-led training and hands-on workshops from Azure fundamentals to advanced services
  • Real-world projects to build solutions with Azure technologies
  • Networking and collaboration with fellow developers and industry professionals
  • Knowledge sharing with experienced Azure practitioners and Microsoft MVPs
  • Career development and certification prep for cloud roles

How to Get Involved

Join our Meetup, attend sessions, and start building with the community. Follow us on LinkedIn and Twitter/X for updates and event announcements.
